column1: Baby Barnaby's////Amazing (and cheap) breakfast dishes and combos
column3: and your choice of the cozy diner or the relaxed patio.  I'm here at least twice a month for a lazy weekend morning.  Fresh juice
column4: great service...no complaints at all.  Ever.  Do expect to wait
column6: and make sure you put your name on the clipboard outside (yes
column7: you have to do it yourself. Don't complain at the waiter that you didn't know what to do.  He's too nice for that.)
